English: the Four Great Poets of the Early Tang, namely Wang Bo `王勃~[Wang2 Bo2], Yang Jiong `楊~`炯~|杨`炯~[Yang2 Jiong3], Lu Zhaolin `盧照鄰~|卢`照~邻[Lu2 Zhao4 lin2], and Luo Binwang `駱賓王~|骆宾`王~[Luo4 Bin1 wang2]

d.f: `唐~`初~`詩壇~`的~`四大~`家~：`王勃~、`楊~`烱~、`盧照鄰~、`駱賓王~，`號稱~「`初唐四傑~」。

English: the Four Great Poets of the Early Tang, namely Wang Bo `王勃~[Wang2 Bo2], Yang Jiong `楊~`炯~|杨`炯~[Yang2 Jiong3], Lu Zhaolin `盧照鄰~|卢`照~邻[Lu2 Zhao4 lin2], and Luo Binwang `駱賓王~|骆宾`王~[Luo4 Bin1 wang2]
